_sText:
Due the fact my older version had a lack of optimization, lack of "good" gameplay, I revisioned it.
Overview can be found [here](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12554673/Mapping/overview.png "")

I've added 20-30 areaportals all over the map to get a stable FPS on every weak PC.

Contains: 

- Armory 

- Football 

- Air Football 

- Pool 

- Game Area (A/B/C, Spray contest)

- Big vent (+Secrets)

- Race/Climb 

- Disco

Updates in this version:

- Bullets go through glass

- Airfootball made easier

- Climb made easier

- Made a secret easier

- Balanced the secrets

- New songs.

- Minimap/Map overview

- Gravity at airfootball
